snippet: The Chicago Bulls are becoming an offensive juggernaut but they are quick to credit their defense for a season-high six-game winning streak and a rapid rise up the NBA's scoring rankings....
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bulls are becoming an offensive juggernaut but they are quick to credit their defense for a season-high six-game winning streak and a rapid rise up the NBA's scoring rankings.

headline.main: Defensive-Minded Bulls Top Celts for Sixth in a Row
headline.print_headline: Defensive-Minded Bulls Top Celts for Sixth in a Row
